name: CustEx
overview:
CustEx was founded by technology executive Daniel Curran, formerly Vice President of Strategic Planning for Western Digital [NYSE: WDC] Corp.’s Connex Division in San Jose, CA [Silicon Valley]. Mr. Curran has 30 years’ broad experience leading companies like WDC[VP & acting COO], AlaStor[CEO], USLab[CEO], US Interactive[Director], Northrop Grumman, Real Entertainment[VP], and 4Link Networks[EVP].

Dan envisioned the CustEx platform in 2006 after founding and teaching a Technology Innovator’s Forum at UCLA. Serious relationships with customers at the Fortune 500 ensued, and the 15-revenue stream network-effect business model and MVC software coding for the platform began in 2012.
